section.12: The Book of The At-Tatbiq (Clasping One's Hands Together)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Bushr said:"I heard Yusuf-meaning Ibn Mahak- narrating that Hakim said: 'I gave my pledge of allegiance to the Messenger of Allah (ï·º), pledging that I would go down (in prostration) only after standing up from bowing
